message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a great deal on this amazing product. I think you'll love it!
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the product, but I believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. I am willing to pay up to $130 for the product.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. How about we meet at $142?
Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I appreciate the effort. I would like to counter with a price of $135 for the product.
I'm not willing to go as low as $135, Bob. I think the product is worth more than that. How about we try $145?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offers, but I still believe the product should be within my budget. I am willing to pay $140 for the product.
I'm not going to give up yet, Bob. I think you're getting close to the value I have in mind. How about we meet at $147?
Hello Alice, I respect your persistence, but I am sticking to my budget. I am willing to pay $142 for the product.
I'm not going to give up on this deal, Bob. I'm willing to make one last offer. How about we meet at $148?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your efforts, but I am unable to go beyond my budget. I am willing to pay $145 for the product.
